org.thethingsnetwork.data.mqtt

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.thethingsnetwork.data.common.AbstractClient
      • org.thethingsnetwork.data.mqtt.Client

  • public class Client
extends AbstractClient
    This is the base class to be used to interact with The Things Network Handler
    Author:
    Romain Cambier

    • Constructor Detail

      • Client

        public Client(String _broker,
              String _appId,
              String _appAccessKey)
       throws URISyntaxException
        Create a new Client from a custom broker
        Parameters:
        _broker - The broker address, including protocol and port
        _appId - Your appId (or appEUI for staging)
        _appAccessKey - Your appAccessKey
        Throws:
        URISyntaxException - if the provided broker address is malformed

      • Client

        public Client(String _broker,
              String _appId,
              String _appAccessKey,
              org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttConnectOptions _connOpts)
       throws URISyntaxException
        Create a new Client from a custom broker
        Parameters:
        _broker - The broker address, including protocol and port
        _appId - Your appId (or appEUI for staging)
        _appAccessKey - Your appAccessKey
        _connOpts - Connection options to be used
        Throws:
        URISyntaxException - if the provided broker address is malformed
